metadata.title: Functions that convert between integer planar buffers

abstract.text: Make large-scale mathematical computations and image calculations, optimized for high performance and low energy consumption.
Convert an image to a different format.
Convert the bit depths of interleaved integer image data.

abstract.text: Converts an unsigned 12-bit planar buffer to an unsigned 16-bit planar buffer.
